attributes.action: order that the term 'Honourable' be barred from use in the confines of the Palace of Westminster, forthwith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent revelations have proved that 'Honourable' is the least appropriate word to describe what our current crop of elected representatives are!

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
